column6: Ergative -> ,gédudi 'cat' -> initial stress (H!H),íčadi 'mare' -> initial stress (HL),imudí 'father -> initial/prefinal/final (HH),qučidí 'sheepskin' -> final (HL-B),buRadí 'bull' -> final/prefinal (HL!),haidí 'eye -> final/prefinal (LL),łérudi 'feather' -> final/initial (HH!),sét'iladi 'finger -> final/initial (LL-B),zinadí 'cow' -> final/prefinal/initial (HH-B),
